title: Ep. 127 - This Expert Sees Gold Prices Pushing Lower
itunes:title: This Expert Sees Gold Prices Pushing Lower
description: John Doody, editor of the Gold Stock Analyst newsletter, says gold prices could continue pushing lower throughout 2012. He does see some bright spots, as several stocks in the sector are now oversold. He shares his favorite speculative pick with listeners.
content:encoded: John Doody, editor of the Gold Stock Analyst newsletter, says gold prices could continue pushing lower throughout 2012. He does see some bright spots, as several stocks in the sector are now oversold. He shares his favorite speculative pick with listeners.
itunes:subtitle: www.investorradio4.com
